meanings.sent1: The knight carried an unforged sword into battle.
meanings.sent2: The jeweler confirmed that the ring was unforged and of high quality.
meanings.sent3: The detective found the unforged painting hidden in the attic.
meanings.sent4: Her unforged smile revealed her true emotions.
meanings.sent5: The unforged document bore the official seal of approval.

meanings.sent1: The unforged signature on the contract was a sign of authenticity.
meanings.sent2: The ancient artifact remained unforged despite centuries of existence.
meanings.sent3: The unforged story of the lost treasure captivated the children.
meanings.sent4: His unforged loyalty to his friends never wavered.
meanings.sent5: The unforged memories of childhood brought a sense of nostalgia.

meanings.sent1: The unforged antique vase was a valuable find for the collector.
meanings.sent2: Her unforged apology was heartfelt and sincere.
meanings.sent3: The unforged laughter of the children echoed through the park.
meanings.sent4: His unforged kindness touched the hearts of those around him.
meanings.sent5: The unforged bond between the siblings was unbreakable.
